title: Maigret in Vichy
description: When his relaxing vacation is interrupted by a small-town murder, Inspector Maigret can't resist lending his investigative powers to the caseInspector Maigret and his wife take a much needed holiday to Vichy, where they quickly become used to the slower pace of life. But when a woman who they regularly pass by on their daily strolls is murdered, Maigret can't help but offer his assistance to the local Inspector, a former colleague of his.
author: Georges Simenon
